update g_role
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LV = #{lv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LV_TOP = #{lvTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXP = #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UP_EXP = #{upExp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOLD = #{gold,jdbcType=INTEGER},

IQ = #{iq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HP = #{hp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOW_HP = #{nowHp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MP = #{mp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOW_MP = #{nowMp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HIT = #{hit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CRIT = #{crit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EVAD = #{evad,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ATK = #{atk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEF = #{def,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VIT = #{vit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VIT_TOP = #{vitTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STR = #{str,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STR_TOP = #{strTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AGI = #{agi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AGI_TOP = #{agiTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},

PET_NUM_LIMIT = #{petNumLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOUNT_TOTAL = #{mountTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BACKPACK = #{backpack,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
